detectors.description:
SPAMToken.allowance(address,address).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#603) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#449-451) (function)

SPAMToken._approve(address,address,uint256).owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#857) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#449-451) (function)

SPAMToken._applyNewAccountDeflation(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#750-767) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ! skippedAccountFromDeflation[sender] && (accountToBeDeducted[sender] && now >= deductedAfterTime[sender]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#751)
	- now > nextNewAccountDeflationTimePeriod (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#758)
detectors.markdown:
[SPAMToken._applyNewAccountDeflation(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#L750-L767) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [! skippedAccountFromDeflation[sender] && (accountToBeDeducted[sender] && now >= deductedAfterTime[sender])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#L751)
	- [now > nextNewAccountDeflationTimePeriod](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#L758)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#324-330):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#328)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#390-411):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#394)

SPAMToken.constructor(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#532-539) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _amountToMint = 100000 * 10 ** 18 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SPAMToken.sol#535)
